Input your real name Input the ID number Advanced Auth Add certificate photo Frontp Back Pic with certificate in hand Select image Select image Select image Submitted Example Requires: 
1. Your pic must be jpg or png and less than 4M. 
2. Confirm that the photo has no watermark, no stains, the identity information must be clear, the head must be clear, and should not be text-revise photo. 
3. Please provide the photo with your ID certificate held by both your hands. Be sure that the ID photo is clearly visible, no makeup and fully expose your arms and hands, the ID info are not covered by your hands, and your face is not covered by the certificate. 
Click "Add" to check the example. You are required to prove your own photo without PS. Platform Intro Company Intro Service Agreement Customer Service Update V%1$s Content Image(optional, describe your problem) %1$d/%2$d %1$s/%2$s Please describe the problem you found. Upload a screenshot if possible. Submit 1. Minimum withdrawal amount: XX 
2.Be sure that the address is correct before you apply for withdrawal. Once sent to the block chain network, the transaction is irrevocable.
3. Confirmation of all network nodes is needed after withdrawal. You can get your token after x times confirmation. 
4. Please do not take your token directly to ICO crowdfunding address, which may prevent you from receiving crowdfunding digital assets. 
5. Make sure your computer and browser are secure to prevent information from being tampered with or leaked. Event rules Join the group INVT Code Copy Invite friends Generate your poster

Please check it Inconsistent password Change login password New password Old login password Input new login password Input old login password Confirm Input SMS code Google Authenticator Google Authenticator bound Set Google Authenticator Code Input GA code 1. Install Google Authenticator, click "+" at the top right corner, and select "Manual entry" or "Scan barcode". 
2. Scan QR code below, or input the key to add verification token. 
3. The key will be used to find back Google Authenticator when your device is lost or changed. Please backup and save the key below before you bind your mobile. Use Google Authenticator to: Reset fund password Confirm OTC trade Uncertificated Certificated Pattern lock Set pattern lock Draw an unlock pattern Draw an unlock pattern, to make sure that others cannot use your app. Connect at least 4 dots.

 Top-up history Top up %1$d %2$s Long press to save QR code Copied Save QR code Key Copy address Don't top up any non-%1$s assets to address above, otherwise it won't be found back. 
Confirmation of all network nodes is needed after top-up. You will receive the token after %2$d confirmation. 
Minimum top-up amount: %3$s. Less top-up is invalid. 
The top-up address seldom changes and you can repeatedly top up. You will be noted by website notice or email if the address changes. 
Make sure that your computer and browser is secure to prevent information from being tampered with or leaked. Select token Withdraw Select withdraw address No withdrawal address, please input or paste manually Success Minimum amount %1$s %2$s %1$s %2$s Statements Hide zero balances Promotion account Search Available Input or long press to paste address Input fund password Amount All Fund password Notice: Your fund password will be used for trade, withdrawal and security setting. It is suggested to be different than login password. The platform will take no responsibility if your account is stolen because of the password. Confirm 1. Minimum withdrawal: %1$s 
2. Make sure the address is correct before you withdraw. Once sent to the block chain network, the transaction is irrevocable. 
3. After transfer to the address above, you need the confirmation of all network nodes. %2$d times network confirm later, you are able to get the coins. 
4. Please do not take coins directly to ICO's crowdfunding address, which will prevent you from receiving crowdfunding digital assets. 
5. Make sure your computer and browser are secure to prevent information from being tampered with or leaked. Arrivals Filter Token Type All types Status All status Time To Reset

Orders %1$s %2$s Limit: %1$s-%2$s Volume: %1$s %1$d Trades Post ad Buy %1$s Sell %1$s Price type Premium rate Trade limit Available Payment (Optional) Other party Authentication: Trades > Tel I have read and agree OTC Trade Agreement Attention: 1.Please confirm the payment before releasing cryptocurrency. 

2. Do not disclose sensitive information related to your account security during the transaction. 

3. Do not give your email address directly to the buyer, otherwise you may receive fraud mails which may endanger your account. 

4. Please record the platform website on the bookmark to make sure you trade on the correct website and avoid visiting phishing websites. 

5. Platform staff is prohibited from trading with you in the official name. Please do not trade with investors who claim to be employees of the platform to avoid the loss of your interest. Special Notes In order to ensure the trading safety of investors, the platform will use a cryptocurrency escrow system. Any investor is forbidden to bypass the platform to make a private trading, and the violator will bear the loss. 
Please write down in detail your terms and conditions, as well as the matters to be noted in the transaction notes. Clear information will improve your transaction success rate and evaluation. 
Fraud is not allowed on the platform. The violators will cause their accounts frozen and assume the legal responsibility. 
Please fulfill the spirit of contract after publishing an AD. If you bid up the price maliciously or pull back, your account will be frozen for 3-14 days once reported. Price Limit Time Fixed price %1$s Premium price %1$s Premium %1$s %% Fixed price Floating price %1$s-%2$s Buy %1$s Sell %1$s On shelves Off shelves You cannot trade with yourself Sure to put the ad off shelves? Please go for process. ► Number Number Evaluation Evaluation Notes Please bind a phone number first Please complete the trade on page of OTC365 Please release the coins after receiving money 1.Counterparties are platform certified merchants, please feel free to trade.

2.Once the order is made, please complete your trade within 20 minutes, otherwise the order will be cancelled.

3.Please use your own bankcard (or WeChat/Alipay) for transaction. Inconsistency of the name of bankcard and platform will cause the failure of payment.

4.If you have any doubts about the transaction, please contact customer service or apply for arbitration in time.

5.If you cancel more than 3 orders within a day, you will be forbidden to make OTC trades in the rest of the day. Input volume Input amount White paper Token Please input right amount OTC365 is a partner of our platform. Please feel free follow tips of the page and make the transaction.

1.Please use your own bankcard (or WeChat/Alipay) for transaction. Inconsistency of the name of bankcard and platform will cause the failure of payment.

2.Please write down the four-digit-remark to speed up the transaction.

3.Do not remark any word about cryptocurrency (such as USDT), which will make your transfer intercepted by the bank.

4.The order is valid within 20 minutes. Please complete the payment in time and press “Paid”. Cryptocurrency will be sent to your account in time after confirmation of receipt.

5.If you have any questions, please contact customer service of the platform of OTC365. OTC365 is a partner of our platform. Please feel free follow tips of the page and make the transaction.

1.After the order is placed, the buyer will transfer money to your bank account. Please make sure the bankcard displayed on the page is your own and in your name. If you provide incorrect information, the platform will not assume related responsibilities.

2.After the buyer’s transfer, please confirm whether you receive the money, and release the coins.

3.If you cannot receive money after buyer’s payment, please contact customer service. Coins will be returned to your account after the order info is verified.

4.The order is valid within 20 minutes. If the buyer cannot pay the money in time, the order will be cancelled automatically, and coins will be returned into your account.

5.If you have any questions, please contact customer service of the platform. This seller is a merchant verified by the platform. Please follow tips of the page and make the transaction.

1.Before the payment, you are suggested to check the payment method with the seller and compare it with reserved info on the platform. If inconsistent, please be careful to pay.

2.Please write down the four-digit-remark to speed up the transaction.

3.Please do not remark any word about cryptocurrency (such as BTC, OTC, USDT), which will make your transfer intercepted by the bank.

4.The order is valid in 20 minutes. Please pay the money in time and click “Paid”. The seller will release the coins after confirmation.

5.If you cannot receive coins 30 minutes after payment, please contact customer service or apply for arbitration in time. This buyer is a merchant verified by the platform. Please follow tips of the page and make the transaction.

1.Please check the payment method with the buyer to avoid wrong transfer.

2.After buyer’s payment, please confirm whether you receive the money in time and release coins.

3.If you cannot receive money after buyer’s payment, contact the buyer to verify and cancel the order, or apply for arbitration to take your coins back.

4.The order is valid in 20 minutes. If the buyer cannot pay the money in time, the order will be automatically cancelled, and coins will be returned into your account.

5.If you have any questions, please contact customer service or apply for arbitration. Min buy num %1$f Max buy num %1$f Min buy amount %1$f Max buy amount %1$f
